name: William Loftus
text: I called and asked if they had delivery drivers, or if I should call a third party to have them delivered, and the gentleman said he had plenty of drivers ready to go.  I don‚Äôt know if I was talking to management, but if I wasn‚Äôt, they must ‚Ä¶More

name: Romaya Fuentes
text: Best Pizza ever. Wowwww no words to describe how Yummy Yummy üç®ü•ó this pizza is!!!!

name: Tom Cormie
text: Always fresh, fast, and very tasty. True Detroit style deep dish and great round pies. Salads are terrific, and the added bonus of a pint of ice cream keep us coming back.

name: Eddie Rose
text: I do not recommend Blackjack. Rip me off for a little under $24 and then was so unconcerned that I never got the meal I purchased. There are too many great places to get pizza to be treated so poorly. Never got my pizza nor my money back.

name: -GQ- S.
text: Its just ok pizza. Nothing different than the competitors.

name: Arlene Johnson
text: I loved my pizza in Michigan but this is the best pizza I have found in Bonita Springs, Fl.  Love the square deep dish pizza.  The crust is crunchy on the outsize and soft on the inside.  Salads are also great.  I highly recommend BLACKJACK  pizza.

name: Suzanne Novak
text: This is the best pizza and it was better than what I ordered!  I have ordered several pizza's in the area and there's no comparison!!  I will definitely share with my FB buddies üòä

name: Peter Davis
text: Gambled on Blackjack Pizza and lost. The pizza tasted like something frozen you would buy in a store, the salad was just lettuce and cheese dumped on it and the buffalo wings were cheap and flavorless. Ended up throwing most of the food away it was so bad.  Wasted $50 including tip, never making this mistake again.

name: Alayna Vernon
text: Typically LOVE Blackjack in any city. Called at 8:30pm to put in an order and the website says they don‚Äôt close until 9pm. The man who answered the phone says they close at 8:45 ü§® ‚Ä¶More

name: Moritz Cherubin
text: Great quality pizza, very delicious all around. The deep dish is great!

name: Miranda Popoca
text: First place we tried when we moved here two weeks ago. It was so delicious! Will be making this one of our regulars.

name: Jodie Bentley
text: Always love their food, atmosphere, and attention to the customer.

name: Salival462
text: Definitely a step up in flavor and taste from Domino's or Papa Johns. It is deep dish so if you like NY style and folding a slice like a taco, this might not be what you like but the crust is good. Delivery was a little slow and went past ‚Ä¶More

name: Lynn Grenier
text: This is definitely my favorite pizza place, hands down. I tried the BBQ bacon chicken pizza and haven't been able to stop. The BBQ sauce is amazing, just the right sweet with the chicken and bacon. Always tons of cheese, crisply crust, but ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer East
text: Best Michigan style pizza! This and jetts are my favorite. Blackjack has better pricing!

name: J.J. Williams
text: Great Pizza and great staff! By the way did I mention that the pizza is GREAT

name: Lisa Shulenberger
text: Best pizza ‚ÄúEVER‚ÄùCannot tell you how good the deep dish pizza was Needs No Extra Sauce toppings or anything added

name: Charles Seal
text: Please update your hours on google, yelp and your website.  All indicate you are open until 11pm on the weekends and that is not the case.  Called on two different weekend nights recently, before 10:30, and no answer

name: Ann Logan
text: We ordered a couple of pizzas about 2 weeks ago. Outstanding customer service and the pizzas were amazing!

name: Luis Alberto
text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE . Two young kids with bad customer service skills . Long  story short I asked for a refund just for the negativity and the hostile environment   (Waited 45 minutes my food was still not ready kid in the back playing on his phone been totally disrespectful to me and my daughter

name: Jillian
text: Extremely poor customer service provided. I have eaten here many times and enjoy the flavor of the pizza, but a recent experience has ensured that I will never spend another dime with this company. I placed an order for delivery for myself ‚Ä¶More

name: FPM
text: Good pizza, good price (saved 50% using the app), good customer service. The cheesy bread I thought was a little too greasy. Otherwise everyone loved the pizza.

name: nestor gonzalez
text: This place was the best until tonight.. I dont know if it was the crew during that shift or what .. But they told me it be ready in 20 mins.. Then I get there and they said I just got your order it will be another 15 mins.. I ordered a ‚Ä¶More

name: Gary Knight
text: Small salad is really huge.  Pizza is perfect.

name: Kierce C
text: We actually found blackjacks through a neighbor of ours several months ago. The delivery driver must've seen us eyeballing him because he stopped by our house and gave us a flyer lol! We haven't turned back since. Amazing pizza, amazing ‚Ä¶More

name: Tony Giuliano
text: Taste like the box you're eating it out of, staff is rude and pizza is overpriced! No different then the retail pizza places...

name: Taylor Woody
text: I've always enjoyed their pizza. Since I do their delivery in the AM I have to eat at the Tampa store when I make that delivery but still the same. Brings back memories since it's the same as Papa's pizza to go and that's what I grew up with.

name: Lara Daoud Angelillo
text: Excellent pizza and salads! I love the thin crust pizza but if you like thick crust it‚Äôs amazing too! The cheese they use is so delicious! Very reasonably priced menu and the staff at this location is very friendly and helpful. Never ordered delivery always pick up but food is hot and ready in under 15 minutes!

name: Sandieman69
text: Used to enjoy their pizza very much! I still live in Bonita Springs but they don't deliver here though. I am disabled so I have to get pizza elsewhere. It's a shame.

name: President Ashley Adamari Cruz
text: Quality ingredients make for a fantastic-tasting pizza! The pizza box is also sturdy and aesthetic, which is an often forgotten aspect of pizza making. The crust does not lack nor disappoint either- crunchy, soft, plentiful in volume, tasty. Blackjack Pizza is truly a must for the pizza lover.

name: Christopher Baier
text: I know the owners personally and they are really dedicated to the company. Pizza is amazing. Get the deep dish.

name: Marc DeTomaso
text: The way pizza should be!!

name: Peter Reinschmidt
text: Just fantastic food both wings and salads and pizza. I ate there twice and I liked it very much. The pricing was moderate and there was plenty of parking

name: Umar AlFarooq
text: Good food, good staff

name: Derek
text: This place is fairly new and I've been here a few times and have had good consistency with food and I really like there menu choices, it's nice to see a place with various salad options besides 1-2 basic salads and even personal sizes in ‚Ä¶More

name: Phil Allweiss
text: Pizza was very tasty but they forgot the dip for the wings and the wings were plain should have been BBQ.They also gave me a free pizza the first one had a big bubble with no toppings so they redid it and gave me a free pizza  to supplement the bad pizza.Thanks.

name: Joe Marino
text: Just had my first Meatza. Absolutely to die for! 5 star pizza all the way. Ordered online, and tracked through their tracker. Everything was faster than the tracking. Just a great pizza, and a great experience!

name: Matthew Koenig
text: Food here is always great. Pizza smells sweet in the car and is delicious. Forget Dominos or Papa Johns and come here for quality food and good prices!

name: Kelly Robinson
text: Our family ordered a pizza and salad for delivery. The pizza was great for the price point. Better than pizza hut and better than papa john's. I like that their online web ordering is really efficient and offers a tracking feature. Be sure ‚Ä¶More

name: Gourav Teja Srusti
text: This by far has been the worst pizza that I ever had. Dough after bake has been sooooooo weird, for a second i thought i was chewing gum. Trust me, i am never wasting money on this pizza provider.

name: Jarred Droppelman
text: Was having trouble with the app. Called the store Matt was more than happy to make it right honored the discount and the food was awesome!

name: Judy Merrifield
text: Consistently excellent pizza and bread sticks.  I need to try the other items on their menu!!!!

name: Cody Callanan
text: The food here amazing. The handmade blue cheese for the wings is perfect! The best thing the do which helps a lot is they apply coupons when ever they can even if you don't have them yourself. A must try.

name: Debbie Cooper
text: This was surprisingly delicious! The thick pie had crunch to it that was perfect; it wasn't doughy which I really dont care for so I was pleasingly surprised. ‚Ä¶More

text:
Love the pizza deep dish  prices are a bit high but we splurge every now and then for a really good flavor.

text: I've ordered here several times and usually the food is pretty good..im sorry to say that the last time I ordered the pizza was doughy..like it was not fully  baked and it was a bit disappointing.  I also felt the wings were a bit on the raw side..

text: Great pizza and homemade icecream! Very easy on the wallet especially compared to other local pizza places. The staff is very friendly too. I highly recommend Blackjack Pizza.

name: Jon Yates
text: Best salads in town!

name: Candace Taylor
text: Pretty poor customer service when they screw up an order. Manager is of no help.

name: Max Goldsmith
text: Ordered a round hand tossed pizza and wings. Could be the worse food I have experience in South Florida. If this place stays in business I will be amazed. There is no hope!

text: I am in town for a visit, found this place. Brand new store. Could not believe the great service. The ingredients on the pizza were high quality and fresh.
